DOC.detailed_description: In Part One , 8 subject moderate hepatic impairment ( Child Pugh Scale B ) 8 match healthy subject enrol . In Part 2 , 8 subject mild hepatic impairment ( Child-Pugh Scale A ) 8 match healthy subject enrol . In Part 3 , 3 subject severe hepatic impairment ( Child-Pugh Scale C ) enrol . Parts 2 3 initiated criterion per protocol meet Part One . The pharmacokinetics safety profile compare hepatic impaired subject healthy subject .
